scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:shared" "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:mobile"
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:web
scripts.test: npm run test:web && npm run test:mobile
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd web && npm install && cd ../mobile && npm install && cd ../shared && npm install
scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules web/node_modules mobile/node_modules shared/node_modules dist build
scripts.clean:all: rimraf node_modules web/node_modules mobile/node_modules shared/node_modules dist build web/dist mobile/build
scripts.lint: npm run lint:web && npm run lint:mobile
